seo_agent_results.generated_article_body_md:
## 2025 Tech Layoffs: Full List of Job Cuts  

The tech industry continues to face significant workforce reductions in 2025, with layoffs affecting both Big Tech companies and startups. This comprehensive list breaks down the job cuts by month, providing a clear overview of the ongoing trend in tech layoffs.  

From January to April 2025, major firms and emerging startups alike have announced restructuring efforts, leading to widespread job losses. The data highlights the evolving challenges in the sector as companies adapt to economic pressures.
